name: OzoneIndex
0:
”Alexa, open ozone index”
”Alexa, start ozone index”
”Alexa, begin ozone index”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ozone index
des:
The Skill "Ozone Index" informs current Ozone index of a City that you want to know.

>> Disclaimer notes:

The information in this Skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment, or diagnosis. 
Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.

>> Usage:

To start the skill, you can say one of the following phrases:
- "Alexa, open Ozone Index"
- "Alexa, start Ozone Index"
- "Alexa, load Ozone Index"

>> Other actions allowed by the Skill:

- You can stop the Skill anytime just by saying "Stop" or "Cancel"
- If you want to repeat the last information, just say "Repeat"
- To request help, say "Help"

>> Technical information:

Ozone index data is obtained from a service that uses information from the following source:

- Ozone Monitoring Instrument (OMI) from NASA (https://www.earthdata.nasa.gov/learn/find-data/near-real-time/omi)
- Update frequency: available on EOSDIS NASA FTP portal within 3.5 hours after the observation time

** The Ozone Monitoring Instrument (OMI) aboard NASA's Aura satellite measures ozone from Earth's surface to top-of-atmosphere.

>> Support:
If you have any questions or need help with the Skill, send an email with your question to alexa.suporte@techimagem.com.br"
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
